attributes.action: We ask the Government to introduce voter ID and review postal votes
attributes.background: Given the problems with free and fair elections both in the UK and elsewhere, the Government is asked to introduce mandatory Voter ID and to review the postal voting system to prevent voter fraud and ballot harvesting

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332751

If you want a review, rather than abolition, of postal votes we could accept a petition requesting this, but you would need to provide your full name.
